name: Wise Journey
description:
This game was produced for the Jam "My First Game Jam: Winter 2023". I called my friends to help me produce, I hope you like it.

The theme of the jam was Growth and I thought of developing a quiz that through the development of the person getting the questions right would save the highscore on the scoreboard and could develop better and grow the character during the gameplay.

Synopsis:

A boy wanted to have his wish come true to achieve the greatest knowledge in the world. Through that a magician appeared wanting to help him (We don't know if it is to use the boy in the future), he would help him in exchange for questions and with each question the young man's knowledge increased and he took advantage and acquired materials to help him fight the wizard's difficult questions.
